text: Arnoldi is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Bartholomaeus Arnoldi, an Augustinian friar associated with Martin Luther * Charles Arnoldi (born 1946), an American painter, sculptor and printmaker * Per Arnoldi (born 1941), a Danish designer and artist * Vladimir Arnoldi (1871-1924), a Russian writer of children's books and professor of biology * Walter Edwin Arnoldi (1917-1995), an American engineer known for the Arnoldi iteration == See also == * * * Arnoldi iteration, an algorithm in algebra * Paa arnoldi, a species of frog Category:German-language surnames
title: Arnoldi
